Sun 'n Fun International Expo, booth A-034, A-035, April 2-7, 2019
Stop by and visit us at Sun 'n Fun, where this year we are excited to present products specifically for our experimental, kit and homebuilder audience. Whether your panel is compact or expansive, we have products that are award-winning, innovative and modular. Single component to complete upgrades. We have a solution for every style of flying, aircraft and budget.
xVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xvue-touch]]>: Primary flight display or split-screen primary flight display and multifunction display. Streamlined and simplified menu structure results in critical functions can be reached in two touches or less. Feature-rich and seamless integration with popular GPS navigators.
xCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xcruze-100]]>: Low-cost autopilot for experimental aircraft available in three form factors. It features all the same features as the certified AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]>, but priced for experimental, light sport and other non-certified aircraft.
xPoint 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xpoint-100]]>: An engine monitoring system designed for experimental, light sport and other non-certified aircraft, it is extremely compact, weighing only 13 ounces. It includes advanced capabilities such as its high-resolution display, providing nearly perfect legibility. It offers a wide variety of engine parameter displays from Turbine Inlet Temperature (TIT) to fuel flow. Also available for certified aircraft as the AeroPoint 200 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-200]]> for single engine and AeroPoint 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-300]]> for twin engines.
We have more products to show you on display, so please stop by to visit and check out our demos!
